#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<climits>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>

using namespace std;

double xi[100],yi[100],s[100];
int n;

double fun2(double x,double y)
{
    double temp,temp1;
    temp=((x-xi[0])*(x-xi[0])+(y-yi[0])*(y-yi[0]))/(s[0]*s[0]);
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        temp1=((x-xi[i])*(x-xi[i])+(y-yi[i])*(y-yi[i]))/(s[i]*s[i]);
        temp=max(temp,temp1);
    }
    return temp;
}

double fun1(double x,double lowy,double highy)
{
    if(highy-lowy>.000001)
    {
        double mid1=(2*lowy+highy)/3;
        double mid2=(lowy+2*highy)/3;
        if(fun2(x,mid1)>=fun2(x,mid2))
            lowy=mid1;
        else
            highy=mid2;
        double temp=fun1(x,lowy,highy);
        return temp;
    }
    return fun2(x,lowy);
}

double fun(double lowx,double highx,double lowy,double highy)
{
    if(highx-lowx>.000001)
    {
        double mid1=(2*lowx+highx)/3;
        double mid2=(lowx+2*highx)/3;
        if(fun1(mid1,lowy,highy)>=fun1(mid2,lowy,highy))
            lowx=mid1;
        else
            highx=mid2;
        double temp=fun(lowx,highx,lowy,highy);
        return temp;
    }
    return fun1(lowx,lowy,highy);
}


int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        double x1=1000010,x2=-1000010,y1=1000010,y2=-1000010;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lf%lf%lf",&xi[i],&yi[i],&s[i]);
            if(x1>xi[i])
                x1=xi[i];
            if(x2<xi[i])
                x2=xi[i];
            if(y1>yi[i])
                y1=yi[i];
            if(y2<yi[i])
                y2=yi[i];
        }
        double ans=fun(x1,x2,y1,y2);
        ans=sqrt(ans);
        printf("%lf\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
